info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:59AM CDT until July 07 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR COMANCHE...SOUTHWESTERN CADDO...SOUTHEASTERN KIOWA AND NORTHEASTERN TILLMAN COUNTIES... At 759 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Snyder to near Lake Ellsworth, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Cache, Elgin, Snyder, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Roosevelt, Cooperton, Meers, Tom Steed Reservoir, Lake Lawtonka, Boone, Fort Sill, Lake Ellsworth, and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
